original_text: The Lord your God is going into battle with you. He will fight for you against your enemies. He will cause you to win.’
korean_text: 너희 하나님 여호와는 너희와 함께 행하시며 너희를 위하여 너희 적군과 싸우시고 구원하실 것이라 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: The Lord your God is going into battle with you.
sentences.korean_translation: 주 당신의 하나님은 당신과 함께 싸우러 가십니다.

sentences.original_text: He will fight for you against your enemies.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신을 위해 당신의 원수들과 싸울 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He will cause you to win.
